topics.title: Introduction
topics.description: Overview of sales and pre-sales processes
points: Sales and pre-sales are critical business functions
Pre-sales activities happen before the actual sale
Involves technical support and product demonstrations
Focuses on understanding customer needs and requirements
Requires both technical and business skills
Key to successful software and technology sales

topics.title: Key Terminologies
points: Sales Qualified Lead (SQL): Lead ready for sales team pursuit
Pre-sales: Activities before sale, including technical support
Proof of Concept (PoC): Demonstration of solution feasibility
Request for Proposal (RFP): Document outlining project requirements
Value Proposition: Unique value statement for product
ROI (Return on Investment): Measure of investment gain/loss
Feature Set: Collection of product functionalities
Closing: Final step in sales process

topics.title: Sales Process
points: Qualification: Assessing lead potential and fit

topics.title: Pre-Sales Activities
points: Customer Education: Training and knowledge transfer
Technical Support: Assisting with technical questions

topics.title: Sales Pipeline
points: Pipeline Stages: Awareness, Interest, Consideration, Purchase
Lead Qualification: Assessing lead quality and potential
Pipeline Analysis: Identifying bottlenecks and opportunities
Sales Velocity: Speed of deal progression
Pipeline Health: Overall pipeline quality and performance

topics.title: Objection Handling
points: Common Objections: Price, timing, authority, need
Objection Categories: Price, product, process, people
Reference Stories: Using customer success stories

topics.title: Sales Collateral
topics.description: Marketing materials and sales support tools
points: Product Brochures: Product information and features
White Papers: Technical and business insights

topics.title: Closing Techniques
points: Assumptive Close: Assuming the sale will happen
Summary Close: Summarizing benefits and value
Direct Close: Asking directly for the sale
Follow-up Close: Maintaining relationship after presentation

topics.title: Customer Relationship Management
points: Relationship Building: Establishing trust and rapport
Solution Mapping: Matching solutions to needs

topics.title: Technical Sales Skills
topics.description: Technical skills required for sales success
points: Product Knowledge: Deep understanding of products
Technology Trends: Staying current with technology

topics.title: Sales Metrics
topics.description: Key performance indicators for sales success
points: Deal Size: Average value of closed deals
Sales Cycle: Time from lead to close
Conversion Rate: Percentage of leads converted
Pipeline Value: Total value in sales pipeline
Win Rate: Percentage of deals won
Customer Acquisition Cost: Cost to acquire customers
Customer Lifetime Value: Total value of customer relationship

topics.description: Recommended practices for sales and pre-sales success
points: Focus on customer success and satisfaction
